mapper.select: SELECT r.product_id, p.`name`, a.id, a.attrval, r.quantity, a.more + p.price, r.order_time FROM record r JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.id JOIN attribution a ON r.attrid = a.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (user_id, product_id, attrid, quantity, order_time, price) VALUES (#{userid}, #{product_id}, #{attrid}, #{quantity}, #{order_time},#{price})
